app_detail:
Enjoy unlimited listening and reading of audiobooks and e-books in English and other languages.

Find your favorite new stories through personal recommendations â€“ discover everything from current bestsellers to acclaimed thrillers, unforgettable novels and gripping biographies. 

UPGRADE YOUR READING EXPERIENCE

Popular features include:

â€¢ Download in advance, or stream on the go.
â€¢ Switch seamlessly between listening and reading.
â€¢ Adjust listening speed.
â€¢ Pre-set snooze with the sleep function.
â€¢ Set your own bookmarks and make notes.
â€¢ Discover new favorites through personal recommendations.
â€¢ Share your own book recommendations with friends.
â€¢ Let your child explore the library of childrenâ€™s books with Kids Mode.

HOW IT WORKS

Try Storytel for free, and start discovering great stories. If you enjoy it, let your monthly subscription renew automatically â€“ you can cancel easily, anytime you want.

Storytel is available in the following countries, featuring titles in both domestic languages and English:
